survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Subscription-Based Plant Care Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding subscription-based plant care services, including delivery frequency, plant types, and additional features.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with subscription-based plant care services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for ease of response. The scale ranges from high to low familiarity.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with subscription-based plant care services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following plant types would you be most interested in receiving through a subscription service? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for customization.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following plant types would you be most interested in receiving through a subscription service? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1

questions.question_text: What additional features would make a plant care subscription service more appealing to you?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly and allows for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional features would make a plant care subscription service more appealing to you?

questions.question_text: How often would you prefer to receive plant deliveries?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format with an 'Other' option for customization.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: How often would you prefer to receive plant deliveries?
script.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1

questions.question_text: What is the maximum amount you would be willing to pay per month for a plant care subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format with clear price ranges. This helps gauge price sensitivity.

script.question_text: What is the maximum amount you would be willing to pay per month for a plant care subscription service?
